response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. We understand its worth to both us and you, and we hope this offer presents an attractive proposition for you to consider. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1200000}
